attributes.action: That the moD do more to help  service men ,injured in battle and there families
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I would like the moD to do and give more recognition for servicemen who have been injured in battle, and to provide support for there families , who this effects as well.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
